title: So riot just removed the 24/7 ranked queues after leaving them open.
body:
Heyy Riot

I was just wondering why after 2 days you guys decided to remove the 24 hour ranked queues, after seeing them up 2 days ago i thought it was a fantastic idea and gives ppl longer to train and get better, with this current queue closing at 1am for perth players its really shitty and forces ppl to play normals with the pisstakes. when will we actually get wat we deserve?

replies.body:
Where does it say they removed it?

They only turned it off last night for patch I thought and it's back to 24 hours...

Hmm.. theres a little thing called sleep majority of people are doing at 1AM in the morning. You may wish to join them as sleep is beneficial to your mental and physical health.

EDIT: It also says Ranked Teams, not Ranked SoloQ.
